summary.overview: This is a comprehensive full-stack daycare management system built with Node.js/Express backend and React frontend. The database schema is extensive (20+ tables, 11 migrations), and the backend API is robust (100+ endpoints). The frontend has a beautiful MagicPattern design but suffers from duplicate pages, unrouted components, and missing authentication. Many modals exist for CRUD operations but integration status is unclear. The system manages children enrollment, attendance tracking, parent billing, educator scheduling, payroll, and business expense tracking via SimpleFIN/Firefly III.

key-architectural-decisions.decision: Separate authentication systems for staff (JWT in users table) and parents (JWT + sessions in parents table)
Many-to-many parent-child relationships via parent_children junction table
Scheduled tasks only run in production mode
Document categories hardcoded in code, not database-driven
Modular route structure with separate parent portal routes

onboarding-steps.step: Install dependencies: npm install in both backend/ and frontend/
Start backend server: npm start in backend/ (port 5000)
Start frontend server: npm start in frontend/ (port 3000)
Audit duplicate pages: Compare Admin* pages with regular pages
Review App.js to understand current routing
Check which modals are wired to which pages
Choose a high-priority task from immediate-priorities list
